projects.name: QuickCV
projects.description:
• Created a web application empowering students to design personalized portfolio websites by entering details like education, experience, skills, and projects.
• Developed responsive, cross-platform templates using HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript, ensuring seamless adaptation to various devices and enhancing user experience across different screen sizes.
• Automated the creation of downloadable zip files containing fully built portfolio websites, streamlining the user experience.
• Focused on delivering a clean, intuitive interface to enhance user engagement and satisfaction.

experiences.description:
• Implemented automated configuration for real-time call monitoring metrics, reducing manual intervention
• Participated in the migration to a next-generation real-time monitoring platform.
• Worked on Project Order Manager which manage the Broadband user journeys.

• Engineered an API-integrated data pipeline to seamlessly extract, transform, and load open deal data from MySQL to Google Sheets, ensuring real-time updates and enabling data-driven decision-making. Achieved a 30% reduction in manual data handling time.
• Automation of data extraction for deals received within targeted timeframes, coupled with the implementation of Cron-scheduled messaging to associated WhatsApp numbers. This initiative improved communication timeliness by 40%.
